title: Ristorante dell'Angelo
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Italian, Organic, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. The Angel restaurant is an organic Italian food restaurant and pizzeria. Offers also vegan, vegetarian, and gluten-free food. Sample vegan dishes such as marinated tofu with artichoke, mushroom, and arugula; seitan cutlet with lemon; quinoa with zucchini; polenta taragna stew with seitan; and Bavarian rice with soy milk.
